ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Utility routines for Crates (CIAO contributed package).

DESC.PARA: The crates_contrib.utils module provides utility routines for CIAO users, and is provided as part of the CIAO contributed scripts package.
The module can be loaded into ChIPS, Sherpa, or Python scripts by saying one of the following:
DESC.VERBATIM: from crates_contrib.utils import * from crates_contrib.all import *
DESC.PARA: where the second line will load in all the Crates contributed routines, not just the utils module.
The utils module currenly provides the following routines and classes:

ROW.DATA: Write out a set of arrays to a file as a table (ASCII or FITS format)
Write arrays to an ASCII file
Create a table crate from a set of arrays
Create an image crate from an array
Add a column to a table crate
Scale the data in an image crate (useful for display purposes)
Smooth the data in an image crate (useful for display purposes)
Read in the contours from a DS9 *.con file with optional coordinate conversion
Support transformations between the different coordinate systems of an image

DESC.PARA: See the ahelp file for the routine and the contributed scripts page for further information.
